data.title: Gerald Glass, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Gerald Glass stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Gerald Glass - Points

Gerald Glass scores a career high 32 points (1990)

On December 23, 1990, Gerald Glass set his career high in points in a NBA game. That day he scored 32 points in Minnesota's road loss against LA Lakers, 118-94. He also had 2 rebounds, 3 steals. He shot 14/20 from two, 0/1 from three, shooting at 66.7% from the field. He also shot 4/5 from the free-throw line.

Gerald Glass - Rebounds

Gerald Glass grabs a career high 13 rebounds (1991)

On December 03, 1991, Gerald Glass tied his career high in rebounds in a NBA game. That day he grabbed 13 rebounds in Minnesota's home loss against Phoenix, 95-101. He also had 24 points, 4 assists, 1 steal and 1 block.

Gerald Glass - Assists

Gerald Glass gives a career high 8 assists (1996)

On November 30, 1996, Gerald Glass tied his career high in assists in a France - Betclic Elite game. That day he dished 8 assists in Limoges's road loss against Levallois SCB, 88-84. He also had 18 points, 8 rebounds, 3 steals and 2 blocks.

Gerald Glass - Steals

Gerald Glass has a career high 5 steals (1992)

On March 07, 1992, Gerald Glass set his career high in steals in a NBA game. That day he reached 5 steals in Minnesota's road loss against Indiana, 108-97. He also had 13 points, 3 rebounds and 3 assists.

Gerald Glass - Blocks

Gerald Glass blocks a career high 2 shots (1996)

On September 21, 1996, Gerald Glass tied his career high in blocks in a France - Betclic Elite game. That day he went for 2 blocks in Limoges's home win against Le Mans, 86-73. He also had 15 points, 5 rebounds and 1 assist.

Gerald Glass - Efficiency

Gerald Glass records a career high 32 efficiency rating (1992)

On March 18, 1992, Gerald Glass set his career high in efficiency in a NBA game. That day he accomplished 32 efficiency in Minnesota's road loss against Golden State, 123-120. He also had 27 points, 10 rebounds and 7 assists.
